attributes.action: Make BBCs  Panorama ask about the Conservative Party’s Islamophobia.
attributes.additional_details: BBC Panorama are showing a program asking whether the Labour Party are Antisemitic, to show impartiality they must also ask the question about the Conservatives Islamaphobia.
attributes.background: I am sickened by the bias of the BBC and it’s smear campaign agains the Labour Party and Jeremy Corbyn in relation to Antisemitism.

rejection.details:
The BBC is an independent body governed by a Royal Charter. Under the terms of that Charter, the BBC is operationally and editorially independent of government and there is no provision for the government to intervene in the BBC’s day-to-day operations. 

You can find out how to make a complaint here: 

http://www.bbc.co.uk/complaints/
